docs.snippet: The Bank of Japan could face criticism from U.S. President Donald Trump as keeping the yen artificially weak if it persists in maintaining ultra-loose policy until its elusive inflation target is met, Japan's former top currency diplomat said.

headline.print_headline: Japan May Face Trump's Heat as Currency Manipulator-Ex-FX Diplomat
headline.main: Japan May Face Trump's Heat as Currency Manipulator-Ex-FX Diplomat

docs.snippet: Colbert and other late-night hosts were amused but not surprised by Stephanie Clifford’s “60 Minutes” interview.

headline.print_headline: Stephen Colbert on the Stormy Daniels Interview: ‘It All Felt True’
headline.main: Stephen Colbert on the Stormy Daniels Interview: ‘It All Felt True’

docs.snippet: Former Veterans Affairs Secretary David Shulkin downplayed concerns about his potential successor's lack of managerial experience Monday, saying the key for improving the VA will be surrounding White House doctor Ronny Jackson with a good team "be...

docs.snippet: General Motors expects a revised trade deal between South Korea and the United States would "help ease investment risks", South Korea's trade ministry said in a statement on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: GM Expects South Korea-US's Revised Trade Deal to Ease Investment Risks: South Korea's Trade Ministry
headline.main: GM Expects South Korea-US's Revised Trade Deal to Ease Investment Risks: South Korea's Trade Ministry

headline.print_headline: Exclusive: Spurned by Top Lawyers, Trump's Defense Elevates Washington Outsider

docs.snippet: U.S. Senator Chuck Grassley on Wednesday blasted the Trump administration over its handling of trade issues, saying while the United States should act, China's retaliatory moves were disproportionately affecting America's agriculture sector.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Must 'Mitigate' Trade Damage on American Farmers: Senator
headline.main: U.S. Must 'Mitigate' Trade Damage on American Farmers: Senator

docs.snippet: Ford Motor Co on Wednesday said it encouraged the U.S. and Chinese governments to "work together to resolve issues" after China retaliated against U.S. plans to impose tariffs with a list of similar duties.

headline.print_headline: Ford Motor Urges U.S., China to Resolve Trade Issues
headline.main: Ford Motor Urges U.S., China to Resolve Trade Issues
